properties.entry: INSERT INTO REPORT (REPORT_NO, CATEGORY_NO, REPORT_CONTENT, REF_TYPE,REF_NO) VALUES (SQ_REPORT_PK.nextval,?,?,?,?)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM REPORT

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS "RNUM", A.* FROM( SELECT R.REPORT_NO, R.CATEGORY_NO, R.REF_TYPE, R.REF_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, R.REPORT_CONTENT, R.STATUS
FROM REPORT R JOIN BOARD B ON (R.CATEGORY_NO = B.CATEGORY_NO) ORDER BY R.REPORT_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT * FROM REPORT R JOIN BOARD B ON (R.CATEGORY_NO = B.CATEGORY_NO) WHERE REPORT_NO = ?
UPDATE REPORT R SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE REPORT_NO = ?
